attributes.title: VeRy NoT oK
attributes.review: It was very rude to me because I am apart of the LGBTQ 🏳️‍🌈. It was calling me names and would always kick me off the app. I don’t recommend it. Very homophobic which I don’t stand at 🧚‍♀️💫 ALL🧚🏼‍♂️✨

attributes.title: so mean ☹️😢😤
attributes.review:
as soon as i opened the app they told me that if i don’t vote for trump they would steal my dog and car and replace them with robots that would spread cockroaches🦗🦗 all over my house 😱 they also show used dirty pads on my screen 😷 🤢
update: after i posted that secret service showed up at my door and made fun of my legs 🦵 🤭😰

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD! IT IS A VIRUS!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app wondering what “trump” meant when my phone started to glitch out! my screen displayed a horrific looking wrinkled cheeto man! this is absolutely inappropriate!

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: I hated this app. I instantly turned into a racist, homophobic, white supremacist, Cheeto when I opened the app. His repulsiveness is spreading. Don’t open the app it could be you next.

attributes.title: not good very bad!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to better inform myself about our country and president but was horrified and traumatized when i opened the app to see a nude photo of the cheeto man himself. when i tried to click off this horrific photo my parents saw the photo and took away my pet rat and fed him to the cat. horrible app! :(((

attributes.title: Disgusting and Just NO!
attributes.review: This app when i opens it was as bad as sweaty pigs with cheeto dust on them. My mom was going on a unicorn ride and fell off of it after opening this crap.
